did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Renew Media/Rockefeller Foundation Fellowships in New Media Art 2003-2004.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Renew Media, Rockefeller Foundation and National Video Resources.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The collection consists of artist's files submitted to sponsors the Rockefeller Foundation and National Video Resources in application for New Media Fellowships.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of artists' files submitted to the Rockefeller Foundation and National Video Resources, who sponsored the New Media Fellowships. The files comprise artistic proposals and outlines, individual artists' curricula vitae, recommendation and reference letters, and supporting digital and media art on CDs or DVDs.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Renew Media, Rockefeller Foundation and National Video Resources.

descgrp.head: INFORMATION FOR USERS

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Renew Media/Rockefeller Foundation Fellowships in New Media Art #6673 . Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

descgrp.p: Links to the artist's webpages are not maintained. The URLs for these projects are provided, but many no longer go anywhere. You may have success finding archived versions of them using the Internet Archive Wayback Machine, http://web.archive.org
Some digital content has been archived by Cornell and that content can be found by following the links labeled "Link to archived internet material."
